**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 223 1.1 **Archetype** [Wrestler](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=270) **Prerequisites** [Wrestler Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=6446) **Requirements** You have a creature [grabbed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=77) or [restrained](/Conditions.aspx?ID=90). --- Your iron grip saps your opponent’s strength. Attempt an [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=36) check to [Grapple](/Actions.aspx?ID=2376) the creature you have grabbed or restrained, with the following additional effects if you succeed. **Critical Success** The target is [enfeebled](/Conditions.aspx?ID=71) 2 until the end of its next turn and then is enfeebled 1 for 1 minute.
**Success** The target is enfeebled 1 until the end of its next turn.
